title.narrative: Realize establishment of Environmentally fit PP bag Factory

description.narrative:
1. Support 12 PC in improving financial management and their service delivery through Jobsjobs cost sharing

2. Support export of Gum Arabic

3. support in specification development for PP bag factory procurement

Lemlem FCU has 25-member primary cooperatives (PCs) representing with 22active and 3 inactive PCs owned by 28 065 individual farmer members of which 6 579 women members cover around 49% of the population of Welkait wereda.  This FCU has enormous potential for growth and ability to contribute for the local development. However it has constrained by many factors not to convert the potential opportunities into member's and community benefits. The key constraints are related with limited leadership skill and capacity intermes of developing and executing strategic goals and plan week internal capital formation week members engagement and participation week service provision week output aggregation and market engagement etc.                            

Therefore this Action plan designed to facilitate improvement and enhance its leadership's strategic plan execution skill and capacity through experienced Agri pooler coaching on development and execution of strategic plan build Internal Capitalization for better investment enhance member's commitment and Women engagement and participation in leadership as well improve service provision output aggregation and market engagement etc. 

PC Organizational strengthening through establishing PC support Unit at FCU level with an objective of improving PC's Financial management and support PCs to recruited at least one Manager and accountant on cost sharing bases with FCU. improve value chain activities of sesame and other cash crop commodities. conduct feasibilities and establish PP Back factory to improve postharvest handling of products. enhance women inclusion in business such as honey production and fattening activities.

This Project with lemlem W. FCU designed to improve PC level financial management and their service delivery enhance Internal Capitalization for investment on PP bag factory enhance member's commitment youth and Women engagement and participation in leadership as well improve service provision output aggregation and market engagement etc.
